rules_text:
The Realm of Sorcery enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{4}{B}, {T}: Transform The Realm of Sorcery. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into Kerovotz, each opponent discards a card.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
flavor_text2: [i]Kerovotz will empower anyone, but the price is always high and often hidden.[/i]
